synopsis.text:
Head lined by the affable and sociable Aine Yuuki, Star Harmony Academy's newest idol sensation is here! Enrolled in the general education track, Aine's natural ability to make friends leads her to an unexpected encounter with the school's top idol, Mio Minato. With their immediate connection, Mio invites Aine to join her in the world of idols, and thus begins their journey to become the dazzling 'Diamond Friends'.

As they navigate the idol division of Star Harmony Academy, Aine and Mio form a strong bond, supported by fellow idols Maika Chouno and Ema Hinata. Sharing the 'Diamond Friends' title with the admired duo Karen Kamishiro and Mirai Asuka, Aine and Mio strive to illuminate the stage with their friendship and captivating performances.

Join Aine Yuuki as she embarks on an exciting adventure, embracing the theme of 'Aikatsu with your friends!', proving that sometimes all it takes to shine is a supportive friend by your side. Will Aine and Mio rise to the top and leave a lasting impact on the idol world? Only time will tell, so don't miss out on their sparkling journey!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
